body_html:
I have tried to configure JNI. I created native classes, Application.mk, Android.mk, and imported several C++ files.. Seems like I got lost & now I have this error.

Error:error: 'errno' was not declared in this scope
Error:error: 'EINTR' was not declared in this scope
Error:Execution failed for task ':app:ndkBuild'.

Process 'command 'C:/Users/user/AppData/Local/Android/sdk/ndk-bundle/ndk-build.cmd'' finished with non-zero exit value 2

Also modified the build.gradle with this:
task ndkBuild(type: Exec, description: 'Compile JNI source via NDK'){
commandLine "C:/Users/user/AppData/Local/Android/sdk/ndk-bundle/ndk-build.cmd",
'NDK_PROJECT_PATH=build/intermediates/ndk',
'NDK_LIBS_OUT=src/main/jniLibs',
'APP_BUILD_SCRIPT=src/main/jni/Android.mk',
'NDK_APPLICATION_MK=src/main/jni/Application.mk',
'-j1'
}
tasks.withType(JavaCompile){
compileTask -> compileTask.dependsOn ndkBuild

}

Sorry, newbie to android here.

body:
I have tried to configure JNI. I created native classes, Application.mk, Android.mk, and imported several C++ files.. Seems like I got lost & now I have this error.

Error:error: 'errno' was not declared in this scope
Error:error: 'EINTR' was not declared in this scope
Error:Execution failed for task ':app:ndkBuild'.
> Process 'command 'C:/Users/user/AppData/Local/Android/sdk/ndk-bundle/ndk-build.cmd'' finished with non-zero exit value 2

Also modified the build.gradle with this:
 task ndkBuild(type: Exec, description: 'Compile JNI source via NDK'){
  commandLine "C:/Users/user/AppData/Local/Android/sdk/ndk-bundle/ndk-build.cmd",
             'NDK_PROJECT_PATH=build/intermediates/ndk',
             'NDK_LIBS_OUT=src/main/jniLibs',
            'APP_BUILD_SCRIPT=src/main/jni/Android.mk',
            'NDK_APPLICATION_MK=src/main/jni/Application.mk',
            '-j1'
}
    tasks.withType(JavaCompile){
        compileTask -> compileTask.dependsOn ndkBuild

    }

Sorry, newbie to android here.
